REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1265 reute d f BC-WALKER-TELECOMMUNICAT 04-07 0052

TEXT.TITLE: WALKER TELECOMMUNICATIONS <WTEL> GETS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Walker Telecommunications corp said Teledial America has selected the fiber optic system operated by Walker's Mutual Signal Corp subsidiary to carry Teledial's traffic in Michigan and link interstate facilities throughout the country. Reuter
